content: परिच्छदः {@--1@} A covering, cover. {@--2@} A garment, clothes, dress; शाखावसक्तकमनीयपरिच्छदानां <ls>Ki. 7. 40.</ls> {@--3@} Train, retinue, attendants, circle of dependants; <ls>R. 9. 70.</ls> {@--4@} Paraphernalia, external appendage, (as छत्र, चामर); सेना परिच्छदस्तस्य <ls>R. 1. 19.</ls> {@--5@} Goods and chattels, personal property, all one's possessions or belongings (utensils, implements &c.); विवास्यो वा भवेद्राष्ट्रात्सद्रव्यः सपरिच्छदः <ls>Ms. 9. 241</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 40</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 405</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 78</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">11. 77.</ls> {@--6@} Necessaries for travelling.
